name: Roll, Roll, Rollercoaster!
description:
NOTE: The game is still in development, and I have submitted what I have so far to enter the jam. It is playable, with some small bugs. It won't be fleshed out by the jam's end, and there is no end goal.

Welcome to Roll, Roll, Rollercoaster!

Roll dice to activate your stalls, rides, or coasters. Buy MORE of each from the store to grow your population and make lots of cash! Watch out for hooligans who will try to hurt your park for their own fun.

If you get to 50 hooligans in your park, you lose!

Controls:
Left click (and hold) - Pick up die

Left click (release) - Roll the die

Left click (on card) - Pick up card

Left click (release) (on card) - Put down card

Move your mouse to the bottom of the screen to buy new cards (yes, there's lots of placeholder ones)

Made in under 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2022

Theme: Roll of the Dice
